headline: Is Mettler-Toledo Set for Further Gains After Its 13% Jump in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether it is finally time to make a move on Mettler-Toledo International stock, you are not alone. Investors have watched its chart with a mix of curiosity and caution as the stock has shifted gears recently. Over the past month, MTD shares are up nearly 13%, marking a sharp turnaround after months of modest activity and a longer one-year dip of just over 8%. Even when looking at the bigger picture, the five-year gain stands out at over 35%, which reflects the company’s...
